titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Permethrin Technical.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/24/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on Permethrin Technical - (3-phenoxyphenyl) methyl(+/-)cis/trans-3-(2,2-dichloro vinyl)-2,2-dimethylcyclopropanecarboxylate.
